summary: This mod adds the ability to craft Unenchanted Thalmor Clothes at a tanning rack. It includes a separate hood.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][b][size=6]Thalmor Attire [/size][/b][/u]

This mod adds a simple, basic way of crafting Unenchanted Thalmor Robes as well as providing a means to acquire just the Thalmor hood.
That's right, you can now have a separate Thalmor hood and robes! Both unenchanted!

There are many mods that add the Thalmor hood as a separate item but I found they over did it adding in loads more "clutter" such as extra clothing or features. This is just a pure simple crafting mod.

That being said it will not be easy to craft them! They require the Elven Smithing Perk. Each item requires various amounts of Gold Ingots, Leather and Leather Strips. That is pretty much it.

[u][b]

FAQ:[/b][/u]

[u][b]What can I craft?[/b][/u]
Thalmor Boots, Thalmor Robes, Thalmor Gloves, Thalmor Hood.
[u][b]
Where can I craft them?[/b][/u]
At the Tanning Rack.

[u][b]What do I need?
[/b][/u]Each item requires various amounts of Gold ingots, Leather and Leather Strips.
The Elven Smithing Perk is also required.

[u][b]Why do I need the Elven Smithing Perk?[/b][/u]
I just didn't want to hand the ability to craft Elven Robes to just any commoner.

[u][b]No Hooded Robes option?[/b][/u]
No.
[u][b]
Why not?[/b][/u]
It did not make sense to have a separated hood and robe only for you to crate a hood variety.
[u][b]
All the items are unenchanted?[/b][/u]
Yes

[u][b]Does it affect the default Thalmor Clothing?[/b][/u]
No. That still remains as it was.

[u][b]Can I obtain the Hood without crafting it?[/b][/u]
No. Crafting it is the only way. Unless you use a console command. Which I am not going to supply.

[u][b]Will you make it so other clothing/hoods can be crafted?[/b][/u]
No. That is not the scope of this mod. Simple = Better.

[u][b]Are the Thalmor the superior beings?[/b][/u]
Yes.
[u][b]
I don't agree.
[/b][/u]That's because you're not a Thalmor.
[/center]
author: midgetalien
